category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECTRevEffectivityDetailsProperties
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of properties to be compared on Revised Lines in addition to "bl_rev_item_revision_id" (Revision), "bl_rev_last_release_status" (Release Status), and "bl_revision_effectivity" (Revision Effectivity). If the values are different, the property is listed in the "Change Tracker Details" panel, in the "Change Tracker Revision Details Report", and in the "MESINTEG_ValidateReleaseAndExport" and "ME-create-revision-change-xml-AH" workflow handlers delta XML. In the "Change Tracker Details" panel, properties of child lines are also compared. Valid values are property internal names for a BOM Line.
